title: prism_autopilot_d: Autopilot Action Verification
scope: autoPilotDispatcher.ts (166 lines) — 7 actions, AutoPilot + AutoPilotV2 integration

deprecated_removed.ralph_loop_lite: Removed from ACTIONS enum per QA-MS8 finding — was generating fake incrementing scores via math formula, violating Law 2 ('Lives depend on real scores')

decision_logic.brainstorm_lenses: 7 lenses: assumptions, alternatives, inversions, fusions, tenX, simplifications, futureProof
decision_logic.formula_optimize: Queries FormulaRegistry for top 5 matching formulas, falls back to prism_knowledge or prism_calc

safety_guardrails.hook_integration: Can trigger on-decision and on-outcome events (via HookExecutor) but no direct hook.execute() calls in dispatcher
safety_guardrails.modular_design: AutoPilot and AutoPilotV2 classes loaded with try/catch — graceful fallback if unavailable

findings.finding: 7 actions covering full/quick autopilot, brainstorm lenses, formula optimization, registry status, and tool discovery
ralph_loop_lite correctly removed per QA-MS8 finding — no fake score generation
Modular design with try/catch loading of AutoPilot/AutoPilotV2 — graceful degradation
No direct hook.execute() calls — relies on EventBus events for hook triggering (indirect)
Formula optimizer falls back to alternative tools if FormulaRegistry unavailable — degraded but functional
